text: addehattinre janatayile ahankarikalaya pramanimar avarile durbalareat athava avarile visvasiccavareat ceadiccu: "svalih tanre nathan niyeagicca dutan tanneyanenn ninnalkkurappuntea?” avar ariyiccu: "addeham nannalilekku vannat etearu sandesavumayanea atil visvasiccavaran nannal; sansayamilla.”
